articles.title: Oyelabs Pledges 60-Day Launch Assurance – Offering Revenue-Ready Apps or Free Extended Work
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Oyelabs Technologies promises to deliver revenue-ready web or mobile apps within 60 days. If the product isn't live within that timeframe, Oyelabs Technologies will continue working at no additional cost until it is launched.

articles.title: #ThoseWhoKnowKnow: Celebrating McDonald's Chicken Foldover
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched a nationwide campaign to spotlight its Chicken Foldover, which has been on the menu for 20 years. The campaign includes exclusive deals on the McDonald's App, chances to win prizes, and features celebrating the Foldover. The Chicken Foldover is available at McDonald's restaurants nationwide.

articles.title: **Innovative Advertising Strategies in Chinese Toilets: Exploring Free Toilet Paper Campaigns**
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Local fast-food chains and beverage companies in China utilize toilet advertising to promote special offers and new products. Mobile gaming companies also use toilet advertising to drive app downloads. Dettol employs this advertising to promote their hygiene products.

articles.title: Trump's State Visit: Stanley Celebrates Presidential Arrival with Praise and Honors
articles.author: Omar El Sayed
articles.summary: Stanley celebrated President Trump's state visit by presenting him with a limited-edition, custom-engraved Stanley thermos featuring the Presidential Seal and visit date. This thermos became a collector's item and led to a sales spike for Stanley products, particularly the limited-edition thermos, increasing brand awareness among politically engaged consumers.

articles.title: Caspr launches to help Australian businesses embrace AI and future-proof growth
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: CASPR, a new media and technology agency, is launching in September to offer businesses AI adoption, data structuring, and growth scaling services. The agency leverages tools like Veo3, Higgsfield, and MagicBrief and operates through five interconnected areas: Amplify, Create, Build, Innovate, and Think, targeting industries including automotive, health and medical, retail, eCommerce, technology, entertainment and lifestyle.

articles.title: Verizon will give you an iPhone 17 Pro for free right now - how to ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Verizon is offering new and current customers up to $1,100 off any of the new iPhone 17 phones. Also, Verizon provides some free Apple Watch and iPad offers.

articles.title: Chick-fil-A draws a crowd on opening day in the Falls
articles.author: Robert Creenan
articles.summary: Chick-fil-A opened a new location in Niagara Falls. Patrons waited overnight and dressed in cow-themed attire for the grand opening at 6:30 a.m. to obtain free items.

articles.title: Karnataka Milk Federation makes Nandini global, launches products in US at World Kannada Summit
articles.author: DHNS
articles.summary: KMF Managing Director unveiled new products. The initiative aims to broaden Nandini's global presence and reinforce its brand.

articles.title: I tried McDonald's new McVeggie — Here's how it stacks up from a meat-eater
articles.author: Itai Buenahora
articles.summary: McDonald's has launched its new McVeggie burger nationwide.

articles.title: Proton VPN's End-Of-Summer Sale Knocks Half off Its VPN and More
articles.summary: Proton is offering a sale on its security and privacy apps, including Proton VPN and Proton Pass. The sale includes discounts of half or more off the price of a range of services, from secure email to VPN to password manager, with annual plans offering the best deals. Proton emphasizes its commitment to user privacy under Swiss law.

articles.title: Five ways to get your morning cup of coffee for free
articles.author: Assistant Consumer Editor
articles.summary: Morrison's More Card offers a free refillable hot drink in their cafes with a minimum spend. Octopus Energy's Octoplus Rewards provides monthly iced coffees and weekly coffees at Greggs and Caffe Nero for customers with a smart meter. New members of the Greggs app and Dunkin' Donuts' DUNKIN' Rewards app receive a free coffee upon signing up. IKEA Family card members get a free cup of tea or coffee during weekdays. Starbucks Gold members get a free coffee on their birthday if they have spent £250 with the chain.

articles.title: Follow your favorite sites and creators in Google Discover - now with just one click
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Google now allows users to customize their Discover feed by selecting specific publishers and creators. This new feature lets users choose which sources, including ZDNET, appear in their Discover feed.

articles.title: Oyelabs Introduces 60-Day Launch Assurance for Web and Mobile Applications
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Oyelabs Technologies Private Limited introduced a new "60-Day Launch Assurance" service, committing to deliver revenue-ready web or mobile applications within 60 days, otherwise continuing work at no extra cost. Oyelabs offers customizable pre-built solutions tailored to industries like rental booking, taxi platforms, and e-commerce, reducing development time and costs by up to 50%.

articles.title: Kura Revolving Sushi Bar spins out more NJ locations
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Kura Revolving Sushi Bar is launching three new locations in New Jersey: Freehold, Parsippany, and Lawrenceville. Kura also introduces Kur-B, a robot for tableside drink delivery, as part of its technology-enabled restaurant concept.

articles.title: Tatcha founder Vicky Tsai talks skincare that addresses the whole person
articles.author: Aleesha Harris
articles.summary: Tatcha launched The Longevity Serum on Aug. 18, inspired by Okinawan ingredients and designed to support skin strength and boost cellular resilience. The serum addresses cell senescence to visibly delay signs of skin aging.  Tatcha will also bring a Holiday collection to market in partnership with Japanese artist, foxco.

articles.title: Notion launches agents for data analysis and task automation
articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.summary: Notion has launched its first AI agent, which leverages a user's Notion pages and databases to generate notes, analyses, and update data.  The agent is designed to perform complex, multi-step tasks and will soon have customized scheduling and triggers, along with a template library for ready-made prompts.

articles.title: The "superpower" that will replace the smartphone
articles.summary: Meta and Ray-Ban have launched the Meta Ray-Ban Display, a new generation of AI-powered smart glasses featuring a discreet display, hands-free control, and functionalities like message management, real-time translation, and navigation. Meta has also unveiled the Oakley Meta Vanguard, AI-powered glasses for athletes that integrate with Garmin devices for real-time feedback.

articles.title: This versatile Insta360 8K, 360-degree action camera just hit an all-time-low price
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: The Insta360 X4 is available at its lowest price ever. Customers do not need to wait for Prime Day to purchase the product.

articles.title: New subscription box service includes Dayton-made soaps, cleaning products
articles.author: Natalie Jones
articles.summary: Living Local Dayton, a new subscription box service, launched on September 15th, delivering handcrafted essentials from local artisans to customers within a 20-mile radius of downtown Dayton. The service offers three box options and also features products from Bee Green, a new cleaning supply company that provides several items for the boxes.

articles.title: Google's Android Things platform will shut down in a little over a year
articles.author: Engadget
articles.summary: Google is retiring Android Things, its Internet-of-Things platform. The company revealed this information in an FAQ page for developers.

articles.title: Xiaomi to open 2nd, 3rd stores to serve as showrooms, service centers
articles.author: CHO YONG-JUN
articles.summary: Xiaomi is launching a new product lineup in Korea on Sept. 26, including the Xiaomi 15T Pro smartphone, Xiaomi Pad Mini and OpenWear earphones. The 15T Pro will be the first Xiaomi smartphone in Korea released simultaneously with global markets and features a Leica-collaborated "pro camera". The company will also introduce new AIoT products and robot vacuum cleaners.

articles.title: Shoppers say 'don't knock it until you've tried it' as new £5 treat hits shelves
articles.author: Emily Parker
articles.summary: M&S has launched new Pecan and Salted Caramel Blondies with a hint of Marmite, priced at £5. These blondies are part of M&S's new Marmite range, which already includes pizza, mac and cheese, sausage rolls, and sandwiches. Some shoppers have described the new cakes as "divine" and "delicious", while others have expressed reservations.

articles.title: Packely Launches Revolutionary 3D Imaging Platform for CPG Brands
articles.summary: Packely introduces a new 3D imaging platform designed to help CPG brands create photorealistic product images within 48 hours. The platform aims to accelerate product launches for these brands while also reducing costs by leveraging 3D rendering technology and eliminating the need for physical prototypes and traditional photoshoots. It was founded by Rasmus Søndergaard Virkus.

articles.title: Sun Exotic Delivers on Canadians' Healthy Goals, Bringing Authentic Flavors without the "High Sugar" Label
articles.summary: Rubicon Exotic is launching its new Sun Exotic line of tropical juices in Canada, formulated with half the sugar of typical juice drinks to meet the demand for healthier options. The Sun Exotic lineup, featuring flavors like Pineapple Ginger and Mango Carrot, is available in 1L cartons at major retailers nationwide.

articles.title: Wonder, a multi-restaurant virtual food hall, opens newest Middlesex County location
articles.author: Jenna Intersimone
articles.summary: Wonder, a fast-fine dining concept, has opened a new location in North Brunswick, NJ, offering dishes from award-winning restaurants. Customers can order online from more than 20 Wonder spots, including Tejas Barbecue, Streetbird by Marcus Samuelsson, Di Fara Pizza, and Yasas by Michael Symon, with delivery available to local zip codes.

articles.title: Proton Drive review: cloud storage with a focus on security
articles.author: Ian Evenden
articles.summary: Proton Drive, a cloud storage service with a focus on security, is now available with features like version control, automatic photo backup, and end-to-end encryption. It offers a free tier with 5GB of storage and paid plans with varying storage options and additional features such as multiple email addresses and a password manager. Apps are available for Windows, macOS, iOS, and Android, with browser access also provided.

articles.title: **Notice for EEA and UK Customers: Content Writer Expectations for Yahoo! JAPAAN and Virtual Assistant Guidelines** This title is concise and highlights the core focus of the notice-communicating expe
articles.author: Dr. Priya Deshmukh
articles.summary: Yahoo! JAPAAN offers content creation services, including article writing, blog post creation, website copywriting, social media content, product descriptions, and technical writing. The company has provided guidelines for Virtual Assistants (VAs) to ensure quality and adherence to data privacy when submitting content requests.

articles.title: The best Nespresso machines in 2025, tried and tested
articles.author: Michelle Rae Uy
articles.summary: The article reviews and compares various Nespresso machines, including models like the Nespresso VertuoPlus by Breville, Nespresso CitiZ Espresso by De'Longhi, and Nespresso Vertuo Creatista by Breville. It highlights their features, such as brewing capabilities, ease of use, design, and value, while also considering the compatibility with either Original or Vertuo capsules. The review aims to guide consumers in selecting the best Nespresso machine based on their preferences and needs.

articles.title: Proton Mail review: A privacy-first alternative to Gmail
articles.author: Ian Evenden
articles.summary: Proton Mail has introduced Proton Scribe, an AI-powered writing tool that assists users in composing, proofreading, and adjusting the length of their emails. They are also offering Lumo, an open-source AI assistant with a focus on user privacy, operating similarly to ChatGPT or Gemini but without logging activity or using chats for AI training. Additionally Proton Drive and Proton VPN are mentioned.

articles.title: Sun Exotic Delivers on Canadians' Healthy Goals, Bringing Authentic Flavors without the "High Sugar" Label
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: Rubicon Exotic is launching a new line of tropical juices named Sun Exotic in Canada. These juices are formulated with half the sugar of typical juice drinks, using natural stevia sweetening and featuring flavors such as Pineapple Ginger, Fruit Punch, and Mango Carrot. The Sun Exotic debut lineup is available in 1L family-size cartons at major retailers nationwide.

articles.title: Amazon reduces self-emptying robot vacuum that 'makes floor so clean'
articles.author: Nina Crighton
articles.summary: Dreame D9 Max Gen 2 robot vacuum is on sale for £149, featuring 6,000 Pa suction, a 570 ml dust box, smart mapping, and a built-in mop. Dyson has also reduced the price of its V8 Advanced cordless vacuum to £299.99. The Shark Classic Anti Hair Wrap Upright Pet Vacuum is priced at £199.99.

articles.title: Hasselblad X2D II 100C vs Fujifilm GFX 100 II: medium format showdown
articles.author: system
articles.summary: Hasselblad announced the X2D II 100C camera. It is the latest camera in Hasselblad's medium-format lineup.

articles.title: Spiroligomers: Molecular Legos Overcome Traditional Therapeutic Limitations
articles.author: The Scientist
articles.summary: A company is developing Spiroligomers™, representing a new product introduction or development.

articles.title: Aldi's Fan-Favorite $7 Tumbler Is Back in Cozy Fall Colors
articles.author: Nathan Hutsenpiller
articles.summary: Aldi is re-introducing the Crofton 24-Ounce Stainless Steel Water Bottle in new fall colors (Blue, Grey, Purple, and Red) for $6.99.  The bottle features a double-walled stainless steel design, a removable lid with a flip-up straw nozzle, and is dishwasher safe. It will be available starting Wednesday, September 24.

articles.title: Kazakh Flour Supplied to US Market
articles.author: Dana Omirgazy
org: Ministry of Trade and Integration of Kazakhstan
articles.summary: Kazakhstan has started exporting flour to the US under the Eurasian Legacy brand, with initial shipments of 50 tons and plans to exceed 100 tons monthly. The flour is available on Amazon and Walmart and in bakeries, with ongoing negotiations to expand to more retailers. Besides flour, other products like buckwheat, granola, chocolate, and cocoa are being introduced to the US market.

articles.title: San Marino Corned Tuna wins marketing award
articles.author: Manila Standard
articles.summary: CDO Foodsphere offers San Marino Corned Tuna.

articles.title: Barnes & Noble College Introduces Room Service – An Innovative Dorm Shopping and Delivery Service
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: Barnes & Noble College launched Room Service. Room Service aims to make shopping and moving in easier and stress-free for college students.

articles.title: XGEN AI Acquires R2Decide to Accelerate the Future of AI-Powered Retail
articles.summary: XGEN AI acquired R2Decide to enhance its Search and Product Discovery Platform. The acquisition integrates R2Decide's multimodal search technology into XGEN's workflow tools, which improves conversion rates, revenue per visit, and customer experiences. The combined technologies aim to provide retailers with an AI solution that understands and converts customer intent.

articles.title: New online stock monitoring function from Lidl Cyprus
articles.author: Promotional Activity
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus has launched a new "Non-Food Stock Availability" feature on its website, lidl.com.cy, enabling customers to check the real-time stock status of non-food products. This service uses a traffic light system (Green, Yellow, Red) to indicate product availability in specific stores, updating daily after 12:00 pm.

articles.title: XGEN AI Acquires R2Decide to Accelerate the Future of AI-Powered Retail
articles.author: ACCESS Newswire
articles.summary: XGEN AI acquired R2Decide to enhance its Search and Product Discovery Platform. R2Decide's AI and optimization capabilities will be integrated into XGEN's platform. This acquisition aims to drive engagement and revenue for global brands through agentic commerce.

articles.title: Pollo AI Unveils The Next-Gen AI Product Avatar Video Generator for Studio-Quality Product Videos  Sep. 18, 2025 13:45
articles.summary: Pollo AI has launched its AI Product Avatar video generator, building upon the success of its AI avatar video generator. This new product enables brands, marketers, and creators to produce studio-quality product videos in minutes by uploading a product image and choosing or uploading an avatar. Pollo AI is also offering a 50% discount for a limited time to celebrate the launch.

articles.title: Bubble Taps Leighton Meester as First-Ever Global Ambassador
articles.author: Bubble Skincare
articles.summary: Bubble launched "Radical Joy," its debut 360 campaign. The campaign spotlights the power of playful, clinically-backed skincare. Bubble also announced Leighton Meester as its first global brand ambassador.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A17 Review: Battery Beast Wrapped in an All-Class Design
articles.author: How-To Guides
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy A17 features a design inspired by the S-series, an AMOLED display with a 90Hz refresh rate, and is powered by the Exynos 1330 chipset.  It includes a 5000mAh battery with 25W fast charging, a 50MP main camera, and runs One UI 7 on Android 15, offering six years of OS updates. It is priced at ₹18,999.

articles.title: 'One of the best purchases' - £149 robot vacuum cleaner that empties itself
articles.author: Beth Mahoney
articles.summary: Dreame's D9 Max Gen 2 robot vacuum is available at a discounted price of £149. Dyson has reduced the price of the V8 Advanced cordless vacuum to £229.99, and Shark is offering the Classic Anti Hair Wrap Upright Pet Vacuum for £199.99.

articles.title: Lidl Cyprus website offers shoppers new stock-monitoring option
articles.author: Lidl Cyprus
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus introduced the "Non-Food Stock Availability" feature on its website, lidl.com.cy, enabling customers to check the real-time availability of non-food products. This new feature uses a traffic light system (Green, Yellow, Red) to indicate product availability in specific stores, updating daily after 12pm for current weekly offers.

articles.title: Decode the Future of AI and Customer Experience at Elevate'25 Digital Innovation Summit
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Airship sponsors the Elevate'25 digital innovation summit, which is launched to equip business leaders with strategies to utilize AI and mobile-first technology. The summit, scheduled for October 15, 2025, in London, will feature insights from Google Cloud, Forrester, and other brand executives.

articles.title: NIQ Launches Product Insights (NPI) in Canada, Unlocking Unprecedented Visibility into Consumer Preferences and Product Attributes
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: NielsenIQ launched its Product Insights (NPI) solution in Canada. NPI combines NIQ's market measurement expertise with Label Insight's deep product attribute data, offering a unified view of how products are formulated and positioned. NPI is now available in NIQ Discover.

articles.title: Four Things You Should Know About The Bentley Flying Spur V8 Hybrid
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: The Flying Spur Hybrid is available for purchase. Potential buyers may need to consider some aspects before buying.

articles.title: ‘Shame': Mark Zuckerberg's Meta ‘AI Glasses' Fail Live Demo, Video Emerges
articles.summary: Mark Zuckerberg presented Meta AI glasses. Live demos of the Meta AI glasses experienced failure.

articles.title: AI+LIFE HACKS丨Still Running at 38! Zhongshan's Washing Machine Is Making Waves Again - 新闻频道
articles.summary: Weili washing machine company gifted a netizen a new washing machine worth 3,000 yuan after a video of their 1987 model went viral. Similarly, another netizen received a new front-load washing machine through a trade-in program for their 1997 Weili washing machine. These actions promote their washing machines.

articles.title: Fastr Launches the Only AI-Native DXP that Eliminates the Need for Dev
articles.summary: Fastr has launched Fastr Workspace and Fastr Optimize, two AI-native products for enterprise commerce teams. Fastr Workspace combines visual design, AI, compliance, content management, and security into one platform, while Fastr Optimize integrates site performance, experimentation, and analytics. These products aim to enable brands to design, launch, and optimize digital experiences without developer dependencies.

articles.title: Samsung's biggest new phone in years may launch in the US this year
articles.summary: Samsung is considering launching its new 'tri-fold' smartphone in the United States. This would be the first time a tri-fold smartphone is available in the US for Samsung. Samsung is still determining which markets will receive the device.

articles.title: Introducing Gopuff's New Website: The Future of Shopping
articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.summary: Gopuff launched a new commerce experience with features designed for desktop and mobile web. The new features include a personalized experience, a live video feed from Gopuff's micro-fulfillment centers, real-time item-by-item order packing updates, and personal product recommendations, aiming to streamline the shopping experience.

articles.title: Introducing Gopuff's New Website: The Future of Shopping
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Gopuff launched a new commerce experience featuring personalized and streamlined shopping. The new features, designed for desktop and mobile web, include a live video feed from micro-fulfillment centers, real-time order updates, and personal product recommendations. This aims to adapt to each customer's life, location, and habits.

articles.title: Frenchie's petit Eiffel sex toy is proof that good things come in small packages
articles.author: Amira Arasteh
articles.summary: Frenchie launched the petit Eiffel, a small but powerful vibrator with seven modes and speeds designed for clitoral stimulation. The device is made from vegan, non-toxic, and natural materials, features a long-life battery of up to two hours, and is waterproof and very quiet. Priced affordably, it's touted as ideal for travel, though it lacks a storage bag.

articles.title: 23 Best Moisturizers for Teens, According to Experts' Tips
articles.author: Sandy Aziz
articles.summary: The article highlights various moisturizers suitable for different skin types, including gel-type, cream-type, and lotion-type, many containing beneficial ingredients such as hyaluronic acid, ceramides, and SPF. Brands like Aveeno, Purito, Byoma, Vanicream, Obagi, and Rodial are mentioned with specific product recommendations for different skin needs.

articles.title: Bragg® Celebrates National ACV Day with ‘Trendy Trade-In'
articles.author: Bragg Live Food Products Inc.
articles.summary: Bragg Live Food Products, Inc. launched its new campaign, 'A Dose of What Works,' to promote apple cider vinegar (ACV). To support this initiative, Bragg will host a 'Trendy Trade-In' pop-up event on National ACV Day at Santa Monica Pier.

articles.title: ShopVision Raises $4.1 Million to Drive AI-First E-Commerce Execution Built on Unmatched Competitive and Market Intelligence
articles.summary: ShopVision Technologies Inc. launched its AI-driven selling system, ShopVision, after securing $4.1 million in seed funding. This platform fuses visual and historical competitive intelligence in e-commerce with a brand's first-party data to automate workflows across marketing, merchandising, pricing, and operations. Several brands including Herschel and City Beach are already utilizing ShopVision.

articles.title: Dreame D9 Max Gen 2 robot vacuum cleaner is 25% off
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Dreame has announced a discount on its D9 Max Gen 2 robot vacuum, reducing the price to £149 from £199. The D9 Max Gen 2 features 6,000 Pa of suction power, a 570 ml dust box, and a built-in mop with a 235 ml water tank. The vacuum also features smartphone app control with editable map and Alexa compatibility.

articles.title: 'I'm a skincare expert - miracle £1.50 cream from Boots can save you £100s'
articles.summary: Andrew Donaldson-Wheatcroft suggests affordable skincare alternatives, featuring Aveeno calm and restore oat gel moisturiser, Neutrogena's Hydro Boost water gel, Nivea creme, and Boots Derma Care item and moisturising cream. He praises Aveeno's hydrating formula, compares Neutrogena to Charlotte Tilbury Magic Water Cream, and highlights Nivea's richness for drier skin. He also features Boots Derma Care item and moisturising cream as bargain options.

articles.title: Frenchie's petit Eiffel sex toy is proof that good things come in small packages
articles.author: Amira Arasteh
articles.summary: Frenchie, an Australian brand launched in 2020, is introducing a new vibrator that emphasizes aesthetically pleasing design, affordability, and sustainability, using vegan, non-toxic materials. The vibrator's material, speed settings, noise level, and ease of use were tested to determine its overall quality and user experience.

articles.title: Why You Should Use a Temporary Number Online
articles.author: General Editor
articles.summary: SMSFAST, Burner, Hushed, and TextNow offer temporary phone numbers that allow users to protect their privacy. Users can sign up for free trials, complete online transactions, and receive verification codes without exposing their real phone numbers. These temporary numbers can be disposable, helping users avoid spam and protect personal information.

articles.title: Slashed prices as Ninja air fryer that feeds 8 now under £200 at major UK retailers
articles.author: John Rogan-Gaz
articles.summary: Ninja reduced the price of its Ninja Foodi FlexDrawer Air Fryer to £199.99. Dunelm sells the 7.2L Flex Drawer Air Fryer for £90, and Robert Dyas offers the Daewoo 10L Mega Draw Air Fryer for £89.99.

articles.title: YouTube Wants to Help Creators Ramp Up Brand Deals. Which Means It's Getting More Hands On.
articles.author: Mike Shields
org: Product for Data and Creator Payments
articles.summary: YouTube is introducing new features to enhance brand deals for creators, including dynamically inserted brand segments and tools for swapping out outdated integrations.  The platform is also expanding its shopping program, integrating retailers like Michael's and Best Buy, and enabling creators to tag products for affiliate fees.  Additionally, YouTube plans to incorporate Veo 3 into Shorts, facilitating easy AI-driven content creation.

articles.title: Flagship, the firm that spawned Moderna, has a new AI startup. But it's not for health care.
articles.summary: Extuitive, a startup, is launching an AI-powered software that generates and refines product designs. This service uses generative AI and a nature-inspired AI model to create and test product ideas with virtual consumers, aiming to accelerate the product development process.

articles.title: EY India launches Techathon 6.0 to nurture next-gen AI leaders with focus on Agentic AI
articles.author: The Hindu Bureau
articles.summary: EY India has launched Techathon 6.0, a campus innovation challenge focused on developing AI solutions for Indian businesses and communities. The challenge, themed Agentic AI, will involve mentorship from organizations like Aditya Birla Fashion & Retail and Tata Capital and feature a multi-stage evaluation process using EY's AI tools. Winners will receive cash prizes, mentorship, and potential work opportunities.

articles.title: B&M shoppers 'feel old' after spotting £20 item everyone owned in 2000s
articles.author: Amber O'Connor
articles.summary: B&M is selling a £20 point-and-shoot digital camera, marketed as nostalgic, sparking social media interest. B&M also lists the £29 Cylo Instant Print Camera and the £25 Vibes Instant Print Camera which utilizes inkless thermal printing, and the Goodmans Full HD Action Camera on its website.

articles.title: Dyson's airwrap co-anda 2x surpasses all other hair tools I've used
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Dyson has launched its latest Airwrap multi-styler.

articles.title: Skincare brand 47 Skin makes The Sunday Times 100 two years in a row
articles.author: Lifestyle Writer
articles.summary: 47 Skin, a skincare brand founded by Nic Taylor in Yorkshire, features a unique formula, Silver ChitodermÂ®. It has been listed in The Sunday Times 100 as one of the UK's fastest-growing private companies for two years. Simple offers Wall Pilates challenge where users can reshape their bodies in just 15 minutes a day.

articles.title: 47 Skin makes The Sunday Times 100 fastest-growing companies list for the second year running
articles.author: Natalie Dixon
articles.summary: 47 Skin, a Yorkshire-born skincare brand known for its Silver Chitoderm formula, has climbed to 55th place on the 2025 Sunday Times 100 list. Simple offers Wall Pilates challenge helping users reshape their bodies using a science-backed app with a 28-day plan and AI coach. SmilePro Advanced Whitening Kit is now 50% off and is transforming smiles at home delivering pro-level results with dual LED light tech.

articles.title: Flagship Pioneering Unveils Extuitive to Revolutionize Consumer Product Innovation and Creative Marketing Using Next-Gen AI
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Flagship Pioneering launched Extuitive, an AI-first company, with $20 million in seed funding. Extuitive's platform uses AI agents to help small businesses in product innovation and creative marketing by developing, validating, and launching consumer products and targeted content.

articles.title: Flagship Pioneering Unveils Extuitive to Revolutionize Consumer Product Innovation and Creative Marketing Using Next-Gen AI
articles.author: Flagship Pioneering
articles.summary: Extuitive's AI-native platform employs AI consumers to mimic real-world consumer behavior. The platform enables entrepreneurs to expand existing businesses by quickly developing, validating, and introducing products alongside targeted creative content.

articles.title: MiniMax Speech 2.5 Now Available on GPT Proto AI Platform
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: GPT Proto launched MiniMax Speech 2.5, a new speech AI model, on its platform. The model offers cost reductions of up to 40% and enhanced performance for businesses. Comprehensive technical support and business consultation services are also provided.

articles.title: Simba Hybrid Mattress review: my best sleep in years
articles.author: Clara Wolsey
articles.summary: Simba has launched the Original Hybrid Mattress, available in various sizes ranging from single (£659) to super king (£1,129). The mattress aims for a medium-firm feel, balancing pressure relief and support, and is suitable for side and back sleepers. It features a breathable cover and titanium micro-springs for temperature regulation and is available for purchase on Simba's website and at retailers like John Lewis and Amazon.

articles.title: TPIsoftware Partners with TaiwanICDF and YEA to Drive Digital Transformation in Saint Lucia  Sep. 18, 2025 10:11
articles.summary: TPIsoftware, in partnership with TaiwanICDF and the Youth Economy Agency of Saint Lucia, has launched a new e-commerce platform to support youth and women entrepreneurship. The platform, built with AI and digital solutions, enables real-time order tracking, inventory management, data analytics, and market insights. Future upgrades will include guest checkout, vendor backend systems, customer reviews, advanced order tracking, and an online payment system.

articles.title: Meta Goes Even Harder Into Smart Glasses With 3 New Models
articles.author: Boone Ashworth
articles.summary: Meta Ray-Ban Display glasses introduce enhanced features such as real-time translation and captions displayed directly on the glasses, visually rich information about surroundings via front-facing cameras, and turn-by-turn navigation. While handwriting input via the Neural Band is demonstrated, it won't be available at launch.

articles.title: Target expands next-day delivery to more cities, including 2 in Florida. Here's where
articles.author: C. A. Bridges
articles.summary: Target is expanding its next-day delivery service to 35 new metro areas by the end of October, including Orlando and Tampa in Florida. This service costs $5.99 but is free for orders over $35 or for Target Circle 360 members, covering about 85% of Target's items.

articles.title: 30 Cool Products That Will Impress Your Friends
articles.author: Daysha Edewi
articles.summary: E.l.f. launched Lash Xtndr Tubing Mascara, designed to lengthen and nourish lashes. The company also introduced Stay Cool Primer Stick, a hydrating primer packed with hyaluronic acid, aloe water, and coconut water designed to prep skin for makeup.

articles.title: AI Search Trends Reshape SEO Strategies in Asia, With Impact on Singapore and Malaysia Businesses
articles.author: Ein News
articles.summary: TD Creatives Pte Ltd offers SEO, AEO, web development, and branding services to help businesses rank on Google and emerging AI platforms. Their services include optimizing websites for both traditional search and AI answer engines. They have helped companies like Chan Brothers Prestige, Epitome Collective, Chan World Holidays, Metaoptics Technologies, and Crazy Art Singapore improve their visibility in AI-powered search results.

articles.title: 'I tried Cosori's dual-stacked air fryer and it's revolutionised how I use my kitchen'
articles.author: Jada Jones
articles.summary: Cosori TurboTower air fryer is reviewed positively for its ease of use and synchronisation feature. It is compared to Lakeland Dual Basket Air Fryer and Ninja Double Stack XL, with Cosori praised for its design. The Turbo Tower is available for £199.99 at Amazon.

articles.title: Dyson's latest vacuum is incredible, but I'd skip this £150 addition
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: Dyson is launching the V16 Piston Animal vacuum, featuring the new Hyperdymium motor for increased suction power. It includes innovative attachments for untangling hair and a wet cleaning head for hard floors. The vacuum also incorporates familiar Dyson tech like dust illumination and allergy-friendly filters.

articles.title: How Gen Z turned ‘Just Do It' into ‘Why Do It?' and made it their own. Explained
articles.summary: A sportswear brand has launched the 'Why Do It?' campaign, which flips the classic 'Just Do It' slogan to spark reflection. The campaign uses authentic storytelling and interactive content to connect with Gen Z by addressing their values and real-world concerns like mental health and social justice.

articles.title: The skincare advent calendar that's sold out three years running - here's why beauty lovers can't get enough
articles.author: PHOEBE DAVENPORT
articles.summary: Avant is launching the Avant Wonders Advent Calendar 2025, featuring 12 award-winning skincare products, including a full-size Pro-Intense Hyaluronic Acid Illuminating Day Cream. The calendar includes an augmented reality experience and a chance to win a golden ticket for a haul of Avant's skincare.

articles.title: Aldi is launching £3.99 tanning beauty dupe that's 89% LESS than Drunk Elephant designer rival
articles.author: Nawal Abdisamad
articles.summary: ALDI is launching Lacura Tanning Drops, a new tanning beauty product priced at £3.99, available in 'Bronzing' and 'Glow' options from September 25 in UK stores. The product contains ingredients like Niacinamide, Marula Oil, and Vitamin E, and is positioned as a more affordable alternative to Drunk Elephant's tanning product, saving shoppers £31.

articles.title: Skincare expert shares £1.50 Boots moisturiser you 'need' to try
articles.author: Danielle Kate Wroe
articles.summary: A skincare expert recommends affordable moisturiser options. These include Aveeno calm and restore oat gel moisturiser, Neutrogena Hydro Boost water gel, Nivea creme, Boots Derma Care product and Boots moisturising cream. The expert provides insight on each product based on the price, uses and effect on different types of skin.

articles.title: ‘A Bit of Rejection Is Healthy': Richard Branson's Voxpop for ‘Doorbell of Dreams' in NYC Sees Women Walk Away Before an Inspiring Encounter With a Young Dreamer (Watch Video)
articles.author: Team Latestly
articles.summary: Richard Branson and Virgin Group are promoting 'Doorbell of Dreams,' a new initiative in New York City. This initiative allows individuals to pitch their ideas to Richard Branson.

articles.title: Discover how Omnisend can help grow your online business
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Omnisend offers an all-in-one omnichannel marketing automation platform designed for ecommerce businesses. The platform helps businesses manage communications and marketing messages for email, SMS, and push notifications. Omnisend allows business owners to enhance how they connect with their target audience and automate messaging through pre-built welcome series, abandoned cart recovery, and post-purchase follow-ups.

articles.title: Guinness Smooth launches in Trinidad and Tobago
articles.author: Mya Quamie
articles.summary: Guinness has launched Guinness Smooth, brewed in Trinidad and Tobago by Carib Brewery. The new drink features chocolate and caramel notes with a lower alcohol content. Xtra Foods CEO expressed excitement about stocking Guinness Smooth in their stores.

articles.title: Pro Breeze OmniDry 20L: This dehumidifier is an everyday lifesaver
articles.author: Carly Page
articles.summary: Pro Breeze launched the OmniDry 20L dehumidifier designed for tackling damp rooms and speeding up laundry drying. It has a 20-litre capacity and features an automatic humidity sensor, laundry-dry mode, and a 24-hour timer. The Pro Breeze OmniDry 20L also has smart app controls and integration with Alexa and Google Home.

articles.title: HMD Fuse Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: HMD officially announced the HMD Fuse smartphone in the third quarter of 2025. The 5G-ready phone features a Li-Ion 5000 mAh battery with 33W wired charging and runs on Android 15 with a Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 processor. It also includes a dual-camera setup with a 108MP main lens and a 50MP front camera.

articles.title: Google unveils Windows desktop app: Features, limits, and early access
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Google has released a new desktop app for Windows, named 'Google app for Windows'. This release is a rare move for Google, as they typically focus on browser-based services or mobile platforms. The app is currently available through Google Labs.

articles.title: [브레이크뉴스] 삼성전자, 갤럭시 S25 FE·탭 S11 시리즈·버즈3 FE 출시
articles.author: 정민우 기자
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics is launching three new products: the Galaxy S25 FE smartphone, the Galaxy Tab S11 series tablets, and the Galaxy Buds3 FE earbuds. The Galaxy S25 FE features One UI 8 with Galaxy AI and a 6.7-inch display, while the Galaxy Tab S11 series offers enhanced productivity with Galaxy AI and Gemini. The Galaxy Buds3 FE comes with enhanced Active Noise Cancellation and AI features.

articles.title: I tried Morrisons new Xmas range – one festive treat was an instant WINNER, it knocked M&S and Waitrose out of the park
articles.author: Laura McGuire
articles.summary: Morrisons is launching a new range of Christmas products across its stores. The collection includes new items like the 'Best Signature Collection' mince pie, Belgian Chocolate & Praline Star dessert, Winter Berry Topped Baked Cheesecake, and a Giant Double Stuffed Whole Turkey. Additionally, they are introducing a Christmas Tree Bone Steak.

articles.title: Eric Anklesaria's Perspective On How BFSI Can Become Digitally Dominant!: The 'Next Billion' Opportunity
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: BFSI companies are encouraged to develop inclusive financial products tailored for the next billion consumers, emphasizing ease of access, use, and aspiration. Examples include daily contribution-based SIPs and tailored digital microinsurance policies. The article stresses the importance of UI/UX improvements, vernacular interfaces, and simplified onboarding processes like Aadhaar-backed KYC and UPI-based processes.

articles.title: Amazon's new AI chatbot can create ads for your products
articles.summary: Amazon is introducing a new AI chatbot for sellers to help them create promotional content using text prompts. The tool leverages AI to generate taglines, images, scripts, music, and voiceovers for ads displayed on Amazon's marketplace and other platforms. Additionally, Amazon is enhancing its AI-powered seller assistant with features like inventory monitoring, policy violation detection, and product recommendation.

articles.title: Nike opens global internship programme offering roles in sport and business
articles.summary: Nike has opened its internship program, offering opportunities in Product Design, Marketing, Digital & Technology, Supply Chain, Finance, HR, and Sustainability. Interns will contribute to projects influencing sport and business worldwide and gain professional skills, leadership experience, and industry knowledge.

articles.title: Nina Chuba Captivates with Mini Stage Spectacle, Highlighting Content Creativity
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Nina Chuba is innovating in the music industry with "mini stage" performances, which are intimate, curated events designed for viral content creation. These performances, often in unconventional locations, drive streams, social media followers, and ticket sales by providing engaging short-form video content.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Buds Core: The Essential True Wireless Earbuds with Enhanced Features Reviewed
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung launched the Galaxy Buds3 FE, offering a premium audio experience at an accessible price, with features like AI integration, enhanced noise cancellation, and long battery life.  Samsung also features the Galaxy Buds Core as budget-friendly alternative true wireless earbuds, offering a balanced sound profile, clear vocals, and up to 28 hours of battery life with the charging case.

articles.title: From Lucky to Lakshman, District by Zomato gives Zayed Khan a trim
articles.author: Afaqs
articles.summary: District by Zomato has introduced a new service allowing users to search and book salons directly on their app. This expands their existing offerings which include restaurant reservations, movie tickets, and event passes. The launch leverages a cultural trend of increased demand for diverse entertainment experiences.

articles.title: LG Unveils the Oled Evo G5 in the Gulf, Setting a New Standard in Display Technology
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched its most advanced product in the Gulf region. This introduction aims to redefine the future of home entertainment.

articles.title: GEO ‘converts like crazy' and is already rivalling SEO for revenue, says Neil Patel
articles.author: https://www.campaignindia.in
articles.summary: NP Digital's founder, Neil Patel, states that their Generative Engine Optimisation is surpassing paid search, email, and SMS in performance.

articles.title: Google unveils Windows desktop app: Features, limits, and early access
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google has launched a new desktop app for Windows called 'Google app for Windows'. The app introduces a quick-access search tool, accessible via Alt + Space, to search across local files, Google Drive, installed applications, and the web. It also includes Google Lens integration and direct access to AI Overviews and AI Mode.

articles.title: Pollo AI Unveils The Next-Gen AI Product Avatar Video Generator for Studio-Quality Product Videos
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Pollo AI launched its AI Product Avatar video generator, an extension of its existing AI avatar video generator. This new product allows users to create studio-quality product videos by uploading a product image and selecting from preset avatars or uploading their own. The avatars are tailored for various industries, including beauty, education, and marketing.

articles.title: iBoozee Launches Asia's First Smart Robotic Juice Machines in Singapore
articles.author: The Galveston Daily News
articles.summary: An award-winning innovation is set to deploy 500 units islandwide. This initiative aims to transform healthy juice-on-the-go availability for millions of consumers.

articles.title: 🌱 Patch AM: Holiday pop-up bar returns to Scottsdale this November
articles.author: Patch AM Team
articles.summary: T-Mobile is highlighted for its network investments and recognition as America's best mobile network. Duncan Aviation has launched a full-service battery shop at Scottsdale Airport, expanding its service offerings in response to customer demand.

articles.title: From Dewy to Matte: BB Creams for Every Finish
articles.summary: A range of tinted beauty products are available, offering options from light to full coverage and varying finishes like dewy or matte. These products incorporate skincare benefits, SPF protection, or function as serum/primer combinations. Each product is being actively promoted for purchase.

articles.title: âIâm not doing too well..â British billionaire Richard Branson with Rs 25,000 crore net worth faces unexpected street rejection in New York City
articles.author: TOI World Desk
articles.summary: Virgin Group, led by Richard Branson, launched "Doorbell of Dreams" in New York. This initiative, in partnership with HelpBnk, invites aspiring entrepreneurs to pitch their business ideas through a specially designed video doorbell, aiming to receive mentorship or investment.

articles.title: Xiaomi opens two new stores in Seoul and debuts premium devices in Korea
articles.author: Shim Min-Gwan
articles.summary: Xiaomi Korea is opening two new "Xiaomi Store" locations in Seoul on the 27th, offering direct sales and A/S. On the 28th, Xiaomi will unveil new products in Korea, including the "Xiaomi 15T Pro" smartphone, "Xiaomi Pad mini" tablet, and open-ear earphones.

articles.title: The Cadillac Escalade: A technological marvel elevating every drive
articles.summary: The 2025 Cadillac Escalade introduces a tech-driven experience with features like welcome lighting, power doors, and a 55-inch curved display for infotainment and navigation. It also offers rear-seat entertainment systems with dual 12.6-inch screens and an AKG Studio audio system, emphasizing convenience, connectivity, and entertainment.

articles.title: 31 Products To Solve Common Household Problems
articles.author: Katy Herman
articles.summary: Easy-Off introduces a Professional Fume-Free Max Oven Cleaner. Swiffer offers washable microfiber mop pads for their WetJet. Keurig presents cleaning cups for their single-cup machines, Glisten Disposal Care launches a foaming cleaner. Howard Feed-N-Wax is promoting Wood Polish and Conditioner.

articles.title: ZOOMLION's Global Service Tour for Foundation Construction Reaches Turkey, Penetrating High-End Markets with Exceptional Service (Zoomlion Heavy Industry Science and Technology Co Ltd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: ZOOMLION's Foundation Construction Machinery Division launched its "Global Service" and a "Ten-Step New Machine Delivery Process". The initiative aims to penetrate high-end markets, including Turkey, with exceptional service.

articles.title: Meta Connect 2025 as it happened: Ray-Ban Display, Oakley Vanguard smart glasses, more
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Meta is launching its first display-enabled smart glasses and refreshing its Ray-Ban lineup at an event today. The event will also include the launch of other products.

articles.title: uBrand Launches AI Logo Generation Feature to Its AI Branding Platform, Delivering End-to-End Branding Solutions for Businesses
articles.author: pressadvantage
articles.summary: uBrand and LogoAI have partnered to launch an AI logo generation feature on uBrand's platform. This new service allows businesses to create complete brand identities, including logos, color palettes, and marketing assets, quickly and efficiently. The integration aims to provide an all-in-one solution for professional brand creation, particularly beneficial for entrepreneurs and small businesses.

articles.title: Sacramento laundromat introduces AI robot for folding laundry
articles.author: De Neeka Hill
articles.summary: Monster Laundry in Midtown Sacramento introduced Sophy Swiftfold, an AI robot from DYNA Robotics, to assist attendants with laundry folding. Sophy handles the majority of commercial client laundry, improving processing times without increasing customer costs. The laundromat is also offering 20% off for first service.

articles.title: Meta launches smart glasses with built-in display, reaching for 'superintelligence'
articles.author: Aditya Soni
articles.summary: Meta Platforms launched its first consumer-ready smart glasses featuring a built-in display. This launch signifies Meta's attempt to extend its market presence with a new consumer product.

articles.title: New Paradigm Investment, an accelerator specializing in startup scale-up, announced on the 18th that..
articles.author: Lee Young-Wook
articles.summary: New Paradigm Investment hosted "2025 NP Synergy Day AI Tech", where six AI startups, including Next Payments, DWIX, All Big Det, Eduteem, Refundee, and Countdown AI, announced their services and cooperation plans. The event aimed to foster collaboration and explore AI adoption for corporate competitiveness. New Paradigm Investment also announced recruiting companies for the baby unicorn growth program in the second half of 2025.

articles.title: 35 Products I'm Convinced You'll Love
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Several new products are being introduced. Hanni Shave Pillow is a shaving gel that needs no rinsing. Laneige is launching Neo Blurring Powder that mattifies skin. OPI is introducing RapiDry Quick Dry Nail Polish that dries in 60 seconds. Clinique released a tinted lip balm, Black Honey lipstick that blends with natural lip color. Nivea is offering a lightweight gel-cream using Q10 to firm and moisturize skin. Elizavecca has launched a hair treatment for smoothness and shine. Lottabody is launching a super fluffy mousse containing coconut oil and shea butter. Kahi is introducing Wrinkle Bounce Hydrating Multi-Balm, a magic wand for your face and neck. Dr. Melaxin launched a "Peel Shot" effective K-beauty product.

articles.title: 2026 Mercedes-Benz GLE53 Edition R announced for Australia
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: BMW unveiled its new generation of vehicles in Munich. The new iX3 was showcased as the first model of its 'Neue Klasse' series.

articles.title: Meta launches new smart glasses with built-built-in screen: Check price, specifications and other details here
articles.summary: Meta Platforms Inc. has launched the Meta Ray-Ban Display, a smart glass featuring a built-in screen priced at $799, set to go on sale on Sept. 30. The device includes a screen to display text messages, video calls, directions, and AI queries and will be sold at Ray-Ban, Lenscrafters, Best Buy and Verizon stores. In addition to this, Meta introduced updated versions of standard smart Ray-Bans and a new Oakley brand offering.

articles.title: Content share and bookmark
articles.author: MELODY TAN
articles.summary: Samsung has introduced the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Z Flip7, incorporating AI and user-informed design for enhanced mobile experiences. The Galaxy Z Fold7 features a large display optimized for AI, while the Galaxy Z Flip7 offers a compact design with enhanced FlexWindow functionality. Both devices include Galaxy AI tools designed to improve productivity and creative workflows for users.

articles.title: Razzl Brand Ignites South-East Market with Vibrant Launch in Aba
articles.author: This Day
articles.summary: Ultimum Limited launched its Razzl brand into the South-East and South-South markets of Nigeria. The launch event took place in Aba, aiming to bring the company closer to consumers and trade partners.

articles.title: The Honda WN7 is a fully electric motorcycle with big-bike performance
articles.summary: Honda has unveiled its first electric motorcycle, the Honda WN7, which boasts an aggressive EV design and performance comparable to 600cc gasoline bikes. The WN7 features a fixed lithium-ion battery supporting CCS2 charging and offers a maximum range of over 130km. It will be available in Europe initially.

articles.title: Meta will let you use a Quest VR headset to turn your real-world space into a virtual world
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Meta is rolling out Hyperscape, a new technology that allows users to capture real-world spaces with a Quest VR headset to create digital, photorealistic VR replicas. Users with Quest 3 or Quest 3S can use the beta Hyperscape Capture app to make virtual copies, initially for personal use, with plans for shared room visits via private links in the future.

articles.title: WAMCO Introduces Peak Dairy Creamer Into Nigerian Market
articles.author: Taiwo Hassan
articles.summary: FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria PLC has launched Peak Dairy Creamer, a new product designed to transform tea and coffee experiences in Nigeria. The creamer, made from skimmed milk, delivers a perfect blend and provides more protein intake and dairy nutrition, and is a good source of Calcium, Vitamin A & D.

articles.title: Meta's $800 computer glasses are here, and they're very cool. You may even want to buy them.
articles.author: Peter Kafka
articles.summary: Meta has launched its new Ray-Ban Display Glasses, priced at a minimum of $800. These glasses feature a small electronic display screen on the right lens for displaying texts, video calls, and maps, and they are controlled by finger gestures using a wristband. They will be available for purchase in two weeks.

articles.title: Zuck's onstage.
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Meta Connect 2025 featured a new pair of glasses with a display in the lens. Meta plans to provide more details about these glasses later.

articles.title: KMB Yachting, the Exclusive Dealer of Technohull Ribs in the USA, Debuts the Rugged, Elegant ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Technohull launched the Technohull XPD, a new yacht model featuring advanced technology, high performance, leading-edge design, comfort, and rugged performance. KMB Yachting announced the debut of the Technohull XPD.

articles.title: Panasonic to debut next-gen batteries for robots
articles.author: Gulf News
articles.summary: Panasonic Holdings Corp. plans to debut a sample batch of its new solid-state batteries by March 2027. This introduction aims to target the next-generation batteries market for applications in robots and other systems.

articles.title: iPhone Air vs. Galaxy S25 Edge: Thin Phones Compared
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The article compares the slim designs of the upcoming iPhone Air and Galaxy S25 Edge. These products are alternatives for users seeking smaller phones.

articles.title: Pokemon GO Reveals New Dynamax Debut in October 2025 Event
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Pokemon GO will introduce Dynamax Duraludon to its platform during an event that begins on September 30.

articles.title: Driving Customer Experience Through Strategic Transformation
articles.author: Jorrit de Groot
articles.summary: SAP Enterprise Cloud Services is empowering customers with a self-service portal integrated with customer landscape data.  This portal simplifies processes for customer-facing units through predefined templates, ensuring a consistent and high-quality experience.

articles.title: How To Build A UGC Marketing Machine That Actually Drives Sales
articles.author: Renae Gregoire
articles.summary: Billo, a UGC platform, has evolved into a full-scope creator marketing stack, offering a system that turns user-generated content into a predictable sales channel for brands. Billo's platform matches brands with creators using AI, automates content creation, and suggests smarter edits, enabling systematic sales and conversions. The platform has produced over 200,000 UGC videos, aiding brands in spending millions on ads through the platform.

articles.title: Get Bissell Little Mini that's saving sofas everywhere on sale at Target right now!
articles.author: Cleveland
articles.summary: Bissell introduces a new product to combat spills, stains, and pet-related messes.

articles.title: Lidl Cyprus website offers shoppers new stock-monitoring option
articles.author: Cyprus Mail
articles.summary: Lidl Cyprus introduced the Non-Food Stock Availability feature in early September. This new service allows customers to check the real-time availability of non-food products directly on the company's website.

articles.title: M&S shoppers are 'running' to buy ultimate pistachio biscuit sweet treat
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer launched a new snack offering that is generating significant customer excitement and demand.

articles.title: DraftKings promo code for Bills vs. Dolphins: Claim $200 bonus, $200 off NFL Sunday Ticket ...
articles.author: The Buffalo News
articles.summary: DraftKings is offering a promotional code for new customers related to the Bills vs. Dolphins game. This promotion aims to attract new users by offering a special deal related to this particular event.

articles.title: M&S shoppers 'running' to buy ultimate pistachio-flavoured sweet treat
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: Marks and Spencer has introduced a new 'sweet treat' snack, positioned as a midday pick-me-up.

articles.title: GTA Online Neighborhood Watch event adds Winter LSPD uniform
articles.author: Shacknews
articles.summary: GTA Online has launched new vehicles and cosmetics as part of its latest event. These additions expand the existing offerings within the game.

articles.title: A US retailer may have leaked the Xbox ROG Ally's price – and it's better ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Asus developed a new Xbox handheld device. The device could have a price set less than a month before launch.

articles.title: Finally, a cheap multitool that doesn't sacrifice function for form
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: NexTool offers the S11 Pro, a lightweight and reliable multitool. The S11 Pro aims to be a less burdensome alternative to full-size multitools.

articles.title: Dyson is about to unveil auto-empty docks for its stick vacs – here's why it ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Dyson is introducing an auto-empty feature, indicating a potential new or updated product offering for its vacuum cleaners.

articles.title: Meta Has the Right Smart Glasses. Let Someone Else Handle the AI
articles.author: CNET
articles.summary: The article envisions Meta Ray-Bans Gen 2 potentially integrating ChatGPT, suggesting a future product enhancement or new feature for the smart glasses.

articles.title: Starbucks employees sue coffee giant over dress code changes. Here's what to know
articles.author: Cincinnati.com
articles.summary: Starbucks launched its 'Green Apron Service' initiative across 11,000 stores nationwide. This service aims to enhance speed, personalization, and hospitality.

articles.title: Brewery makes new beer from yeast launched in rocket
articles.author: Phys Dot Org
articles.summary: A Cincinnati brewing company is set to unveil a new beer this fall. The beer's attributes are described as 'out of this world.'

articles.title: Meta Oakley Vanguard Hands-On: Time to Yee-Haw!
articles.author: Gizmodo
articles.summary: Meta collaborated with Oakley to create wraparound shades. The author has tried these new Oakley shades and shares their initial thoughts.

articles.title: Notion's new AI Agents will basically do your job for you
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Notion launched Notion Agent, an AI-powered product, as part of the Notion 3.0 rollout. Notion describes the agent as a 'teammate and Notion super user' capable of performing human tasks within Notion.

articles.title: How Much Would It Really Cost To Build a PC as Powerful as the Switch ...
articles.author: Gaming Bolt
articles.summary: Nintendo released the Nintendo Switch 2, the successor to the Nintendo Switch. The Switch 2 maintains the flexibility of its predecessor with most upgrades focused on internal components.

articles.title: YouTube Announces New AI Tools for Creators at 'Made on' Event
articles.author: Billboard
articles.summary: YouTube has announced new AI tools.

articles.title: Discover the new Michael Kors flagship store in London
articles.author: London Evening Standard
articles.summary: A company has launched a new luxury shopping destination on Regent Street.

articles.title: A Possible and New Fresh Option for Barnegat Grocery Shoppers
articles.author: Sue Moll
articles.summary: A proposal has been submitted for an Aldi Food Market to open on Barnegat Boulevard. The new Aldi location is planned to be a 21,495-square-foot facility, offering competitive prices and the Aldi product selection for Barnegat residents, who currently have to travel to Manahawkin for the closest location.
